title.rendered: STEDI FORD RANGER RAPTOR INNER GRILL LIGHT MOUNT

content.rendered:
Ford Ranger Raptor Inner Grille Bracket

FORD RAPTOR INNER GRILL MOUNT

You have purchased your Raptor, now it’s time to make it uniquely yours. Our new Ford Ranger Raptor inner grill bracket has been meticulously designed and developed to mount our ST1K and ST3K bars in behind the inner grill.

EFFORTLESS INSTALLATION

Unparalleled attention to details and the very best materials come together to achieve a visually striking yet stealth design which embodies STEDI’s signature throughout. Included is a pair of laser cut 304 series stainless steel brackets, designed to be fastened to existing provisions found in behind the inner Raptor grill using the supplied self-tapping screws.  The result is a covert, robust and secure DIY install.

WORLD OF RAPTOR ACCESSORIES

Our highest priority when designing vehicle-specific accessories is to achieve fit and finish at original equipment levels or higher. We offer a world of Ranger Raptor optional accessories to install our accessories in a non-intrusive plug and play. Check out our Ranger Raptor switch panel, and our Ford piggy-back adaptor for ultimate finish touch to your inner grill installations.

DETAILS

Designed to fit Ford Ranger Raptor (2019+)

Manufactured with 3mm Stainless Steel, and designed to be fastened to pre-existing holes which are already present on the inner side of the front grille. This is a completely non-intrusive install meaning that no new holes need to be made, nor do sections of the front bumper need any cutting or modifying.

The end result is a very robust, stealth installation.

Design is optimized to suit our STEDI ST3K 21.5″ or STEDI ST1K 21.5″ LED Light Bars.

  • Stainless Steel
  • Designed to minimize disruption of air-flow
  • No need to remove front bumper
  • Bolts to pre-existing holes
  • No drilling required, bolt and nut kit included

Price is for the bracket only, light bars sold separately.

SPECIFICATIONS

MATERIAL Stainless Steel
FINISH Brushed Stainless Steel

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x Set Ford Ranger Raptor Inner Grill Mounting Bracket
  • Mounting Hardware

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI FORD RANGER RAPTOR INNER GRILL LIGHT MOUNT

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
